Title: Foldable iPhone Under-Screen Touch ID Rumor Dismissed by Analyst
Description:

Title: 'Grey's Anatomy' actor Camilla Luddington says there are days she's better at work than at being a mom
Description: "Letting go of that need to be perfectly balanced all the time has been very freeing for me," Camilla Luddington said.

Title: I used to spread out my PTO days to squeeze in weekend trips. Now I take a "Fellesferien" period every summer like they do in Norway, and I'm more well-rested.
Description:
Jessica Furseth used to spread out vacation days, but it led to burnout.
In her native Norway, everyone has the right to three weeks off in summer.

Title: This two-time Olympic gold medalist has a new challenge: Working at Goldman Sachs
Description: Ryan Held, who swam in the 2016 and 2024 Olympics, talked about his transition from full-time athlete to Wall Street analyst.

Title: I'm the CMO of a $2 billion tech company. AI has enabled my marketing team to automate 80% of its work.
Description:
AI automation is changing B2B marketing.
Aviatrix's CMO explains how his team uses LLMs and focuses on creativity and empathy in their content.

Title: We moved back to India after working in US Big Tech. We missed family, festivals, and India's roaring cricket culture.
Description: Hemant Pandey and Vaashu Sharma, ex Meta and Google employees, say they moved back to India for personal and professional reasons.

Title: Today, College Kids Get Ridiculously Drunk. In Medieval England, They Got Ridiculously Murderous
Description: Researchers have compiled "murder maps" of London, Oxford, and York to investigate the spread of medieval violence.

Title: Higher Ed Has a Bigger Problem Than Trump
Description: Universities should see the president’s interventions as a wake-up call, not the root of their troubles.

Title: National Grid: UK's largest battery storage facility at Tilbury substation
Description: The 300MW Thurrock Storage project, developed by Statera Energy, is now energised and delivering electricity flexibly to the network across London and the south east.

Title: Catholic churches in France have a bad landlord: the French government
Description: In a fine example of Gallic counter-intuitiveness, almost all of France’s Catholic churches are owned by the State – and most don't appear to be doing well out of the unusual arrangement

Title: Kuo reiterates Touch ID in the iPhone Fold; unlikely to be in-display
Description:
Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said back in March that he expected the iPhone Fold to have Touch ID on the side button rather than using Face ID.
He has today reiterated this.
While there have been some suggestions that Apple might use an in-display ultrasonic…
